es.ull.cyc.util
Class RandomPoolIterator

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.cyc.util.RandomPoolIterator
public class RandomPoolIterator
extends java.lang.Object

An iterator for pools that allows the programmer to randomly traverse the pool. A RandomPoolIterator starts at level 0 (the higher priority) and returns a new object of this level each time next is called in a random way. When the iterator reaches the end of the level, it starts the next level.

Author:
Iván Castilla Rodríguez

          Creates a random iterator for the pool.

Method Detail

next

public Poolable next()
Returns the next object of the pool. This method may be called repeatedly to iterate through the pool.

Returns:
The next object of the pool. Null if there is no next object.
